column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Like all franchise concepts
column2: our primary back-of-house goal is to provide a consistent product for our guests. And as you point out
column3: slight fluctuations can and do sometimes occur
column4: even when each bowl and dish we prepare is done so according to very rigorous specifications. To that end
column5: please know that if you are unhappy with any dish presented to you
column6: just let your server know and we will happily remake it or try to offer something more to your liking.
